document.full_text: united auto workers membership rose for the first time in six years in 2010, helped by a recovering u.s. auto industry and expanding to include workers outside that industry, the uaw said in a federal filing on thursday.
document.title: auto union membership up first time in 6 years
lines_and_colors: united auto workers membership rose for the first time in six years in 2010, helped by a recovering u.s. auto industry and expanding to include workers outside that industry, the uaw said in a federal filing on thursday.
